mapper.select: select count(*) from nhdplus_navigation.tmp_navigation_results join nldi_data.feature on tmp_navigation_results.nhdplus_comid = feature.comid join nldi_data.crawler_source on feature.crawler_source_id = crawler_source.crawler_source_id where session_id = #{sessionId} and lower(source_suffix) = #{dataSource}

with recursive dm(comid, hydroseq, terminalpathid, dnhydroseq) as (select comid, hydroseq, terminalpathid, dnhydroseq from nhdplus.plusflowlinevaa_np21 where comid = #{comid,jdbcType=NUMERIC} union all select x.comid, x.hydroseq, x.terminalpathid, x.dnhydroseq from nhdplus.plusflowlinevaa_np21 x, dm where x.hydroseq = dm.dnhydroseq and x.terminalpathid = dm.terminalpathid ) select count(*) from dm

with recursive dm(comid, hydroseq, terminalpathid, dnhydroseq) as (select comid, hydroseq, terminalpathid, dnhydroseq from nhdplus.plusflowlinevaa_np21 where comid = #{comid,jdbcType=NUMERIC} union all select x.comid, x.hydroseq, x.terminalpathid, x.dnhydroseq from nhdplus.plusflowlinevaa_np21 x, dm where x.hydroseq = dm.dnhydroseq and x.terminalpathid = dm.terminalpathid ) select count(*) from dm join nldi_data.feature on dm.comid = feature.comid join nldi_data.crawler_source on feature.crawler_source_id = crawler_source.crawler_source_id where lower(source_suffix) = #{dataSource}
